title: The Project
content: [Watershed](https://watershed.com/)helps companies build and manage their climate programs.

caption: Solution
title: The Product
content: Reports were released to Watershed customers in May 2022.

caption: Don't Make Me Think
title: Interaction design
content: Slack mobile video calls [launched](https://slack.com/blog/productivity/whats-new-mobile-video-calls-slack-connect-direct-messages) in January 2021.
Holding close a Slack product principle to not reinvent the wheel, I designed Slack mobile video calls to be familiar and intuitive, while also embracing the quirky Slack product brand.
